about:
A Brazilian Software Engineer with 8 years of experience in the field. Currently, I'm based in Los Angeles, California, and I'm passionate about creating innovative and efficient software solutions. My professional journey at EPCVIP has allowed me to enhance my skills and contribute to successful projects. I'm eager to continue facing exciting challenges and shaping the future of technology.

Outside the office, I find my passion in mentoring beginners in programming, helping people take their first steps in this incredible universe. I also deeply value spending time with my family and am always on the lookout for new hobbies and adventures to spice up life. Traveling is one of my greatest passions, as well as maintaining an active lifestyle through physical activities.

Amidst all this, I'm constantly making new friends, exploring new cultures, and expanding my horizons.
